General.Name: Golden Cariboo Resources Ltd
General.Description: Golden Cariboo Resources Ltd., an exploration stage junior mining company, engages in the identification, acquisition, and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Quenelle Gold Quartz Mine property, which includes 21 mineral claims covering 3,814.12 hectares located in the Cariboo Mining Division, British Columbia. Golden Cariboo Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T7
